Description: 2017 Ernie Ball Music Man Majesty Electric Guitar- John Petrucci Signature Model What makes this guitar special: This piece is a beautiful example of guitar innovation. Featuring a sleek neck-through design, it plays like you'd hope-an absolute dream would. The inline pickup selector switch affords the player fast and effortless ease of playing and it features DiMarzio Illuminator humbuckers and a Piezo bridge pickup, so the tonal possibilities are virtually endless. Cosmetic condition: Excellent cosmetic condition with only a few very minor surface and playwear scratches present. Body: Contoured deep-cutaway neck-through basswood body with maple cap in stunning Arctic Dream finish. Music Man John Petrucci Piezo bridge with floating tremolo bridge with blackened stainless steel saddles. Weight: Approximately 6lb, 12 oz Neck: 24-fret mahogany neck with white side dots and chrome JP Majesty inlays. Blackened chrome sealed Schaller with fully locking tuners and frets show negligible wear. Electronics: DiMarzio Illuminator humbuckers and Piezo bridge pickup with graphite acrylic resin pickup selector with custom center position configuration, 3-way toggle magnetic/Piezo selector. PlayabiIity/Sound: This guitar is fast and comfortable and the electronics offer an endless amount of tone variation. The neck-through design allows effortless access to all 24 frets. Case: Original hard shell case included.
